Utilize a craft knife for more precise cutting of small or delicate items.
In a pinch, you could use a pair of sharp, strong nails or a metal object to make rough cuts.
If you have a lighter or matches, you can use them to cut through certain materials, like cardboard or paper.
If you're in a construction or industrial setting, you might have access to a saw or a pair of pliers to make more substantial cuts.
If you're in a kitchen, you could use a sharp knife or a cleaver to cut through some materials, though it might not be the most precise.
